name: ice-burn
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
On the second turn, an ultracold,
freezing wind surrounds the target.
This may leave the target with a burn.
